name: Anand Baburajan
bio: Founder of CQ2.co, Wordamour.com & Samay.app. Prev: Product Engineer @ Frappe, SWE Intern @ HackerRank, GSoC @ LiberTEM

top_projects.name: wordamour
top_projects.description: Personalised word search puzzle for your special someone

top_projects.name: Multiple-Face-Recognition
top_projects.description: Train multiple images per person and get started with recognizing faces with the face_recognition API

anandbaburajan/wordamour.summary: Recent activities in the wordamour repository include multiple push events with various updates such as a refactor to replace textarea with a TagInput component for improved word list management, rearrangement of home elements on mobile, and several design and wording changes, indicating active development and maintenance of the project.

anandbaburajan/samay.summary: The samay repository has seen recent activity with push events including updates such as ignoring build errors, showing creator's default votes, and a README.md update, suggesting ongoing refinement and enhancement of the project's functionality and documentation.

samay-app/samay.summary: Activities in the samay repository under the samay-app organization include push events for ignoring build errors and displaying creator's default votes, similar to updates in the anandbaburajan/samay repository, indicating synchronized development efforts across related projects.

anandbaburajan/anandbaburajan.github.io.summary: The anandbaburajan.github.io repository has had a recent push event with a brief update, but the specifics of the change are not detailed, suggesting a minor adjustment or update to the repository's content.

profile_summary: As a seasoned developer with expertise in Python, TypeScript, and JavaScript, I leverage my technical skills to drive innovative projects and collaborations, with a professional network of 148 followers and a portfolio of 18 public repositories. With a background as the founder of CQ2.co, Wordamour.com, and Samay.app, as well as experience as a Product Engineer and Software Engineer intern, I bring a unique blend of entrepreneurial spirit and technical acumen to the table. I'm excited to continue exploring new ideas and technologies, and to connect with like-minded developers and professionals.
